title: I GOT PERMA SUSPENDED!? FOR WHAT
body: "Ok heres the deal. its says i got banned for having third part softwares. the only software i have running when i play league is a LVOC (league voice over change) it provides literally no benefits whatsoever besides changing the voices in game to Japanese. and this isn't against your guys T and Cs so i do not see the problem. unless you count skype is being the problem i find this ban really out of place. pls respond" i sent this to riot as a ticket and i find no fault of mine that i am at. someone help

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/1VAZ4IW.png

From their homepage. Anything that messes with the game files is against the ToU. I don't know the stance on LVOC specifically, but it's definitely a use at your own risk scenario.

One of the Wrenchmen may have more info for you on LVOC specifically, but I wouldn't get your hopes up.

I only have LVOC thats the only software i use to "Change" anything on my league and as quote 
Fine:
- Any software that does not interfere directly with the in-game player experience between when you press “Play” and the end of game screen. VO mods are fine, they're localised to you and they don't give an advantage to your team.

Not fine:
- Exposing information that’s intentionally obfuscated (cooldowns or timers)
- Taking actions on your behalf (botting or scripting)
- Drawing conclusions for you (predicting enemy positions)
- Otherwise altering your field of intelligence (zoomhacks or global ult alerts)


(VO mods are fine , they're localised to you and they don't give an advantage to your team. ) i have no custom skins no nothing just LVOC

Hey there,

AFAIK LVOC isn't bannable at the moment, however as with any tools that modify league files, **use at your own risk**.

In your OP you mentioned you have a ticket open at the moment, this would be your best bet to have the ban reviewed so just wait for a response there.

These bans are rarely ever handed out in error as from what I know they go through a human review process for 3rd party software bans.

Well human errors accrue much more than computer errors and i got my responds back form the ticket i sent and guess what it fucking came back with 

Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension. We work hard to preserve a fair and competitive environment in League of Legends. Regardless of intent, use of unauthorized third-party programs is explicitly against the Terms of Use, which can be found here:

OCE: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Keep in mind that account sharing of any kind is also against the Terms of Use. You are responsible for all activity on your account, so be sure to keep your account information to yourself.

We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

I will take however long it will take to prove that i have done jack to deserve this even if it means sending emails day and night or even calling them about it and personally donating to rioters who stream.
